items.title: I Am A Victor
items.description:
We're excited to invite you to join us for our 3-day Virtual Book Launch for the book anthology, I AM A VICTOR. You will get to meet and hear from our amazing cohort of authors on Tuesday-Thursday, April 13-15, 2021 at 8:00pm ET each evening.

REGISTRATION FORM
